title: The Watcher
description: To the world, I’m Damien DeSalvo, businessman. I own a security company, ensuring the safety of my clients.But behind the scenes, I’m known as the Watcher.I stay hidden, overseeing the secrecy of Hidden Justice—those who rid the world of its scum, one bad guy at a time.Until the day she stumbles into my path and one kiss changes everything.Stalked and terrified, Raven Bailey needs my protection.I need her.Can I find the man threatening the woman I love before he finds her?We’re playing a dangerous game of cat and mouse.And I’m determined to win.
author: Melanie Moreland
